_comment_general: This file configures the 'Updates Widget' on your dashboard. You can change the widgetType and widgetConfig to display different kinds of content.
_comment_widgetType: Defines the type of widget to display. Supported types: 'announcement', 'spotifyEmbed', 'htmlContent', 'image'.
_comment_widgetConfig: Configuration specific to the chosen widgetType.

widgetConfig._comment_announcement: Use for simple text announcements. 'title' is optional.

widgetConfig.message: This content is loaded from the updates.json file on GitHub. Edit this file to change what's displayed here. You can try setting widgetType to 'spotifyEmbed' (and provide an embedUrl), 'htmlContent' (and provide an html string), or 'image' (and provide an imageUrl).
widgetConfig._comment_spotifyEmbed: To use Spotify: change widgetType to 'spotifyEmbed' and provide your Spotify embed URL for the 'embedUrl' key. Remove the '_example' from the key name.
widgetConfig._comment_htmlContent: To use custom HTML: change widgetType to 'htmlContent' and provide your HTML code as a string for the 'html' key. Be careful with complex HTML. Remove the '_example' from the key name.
widgetConfig.html_example:

widgetConfig._comment_image: To use an image: change widgetType to 'image' and provide the image URL for 'imageUrl'. 'altText' and 'linkUrl' (to make the image clickable) are optional. Remove the '_example' from the key names.
